channel.title: SevenAtSevenSection1
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenSection1, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Trial set over NPR allegations that CPB yielded to White House pressure

item.title: Trump administration sets lowest-ever cap on refugee admissions to U.S.
item.description: The lowest cap on refugees since the program was established in 1980 comes as the U.S. prioritizes resettling Afrikaners from South Africa.

item.title: King Charles III strips Prince Andrew of his titles and evicts him from the Royal Lodge

item.title: How Americans feel about changing the clocks, according to a new AP-NORC poll
Bevel raises $10M Series A from General Catalyst for its AI health companion
item.description: Bevel's AI health companion unifies data from wearables and daily habits across sleep, fitness, and nutrition into personalized insights.

item.title: Canva launches its own design model, adds new AI features to the platform
item.description: Canva is launching new features like Forms and email design, and it makes Affinity free for all users.

item.title: Teacher who was shot by 6-year-old student at school testifies she thought she had died
item.description: A former Virginia teacher who was shot by a 6-year-old student in 2023 says she thought she died that day.
